html: The #2018FarmBill doesn’t just tell #SNAP recipients to go get a job, it helps them find one. The bill requires states to guarantee an employment and training position to any recipient who is either unemployed or underemployed and can’t satisfy the 20 hour/week requirement.
text: The #2018FarmBill doesn’t just tell #SNAP recipients to go get a job, it helps them find one. The bill requires states to guarantee an employment and training position to any recipient who is either unemployed or underemployed and can’t satisfy the 20 hour/week requirement.

html: Today I joined my hometown rotary club in Great Bend in their tree dedication. The rotary dedicated a Ginkgo tree for the year’s theme. html: There's no disagreement,we must address China’s predatory industrial policies, but our producers can’t be expected to bear the brunt of this trade war. We must find proactive trade deals that recognize the benefits of free & open trade while penalizing bad actors that abuse it.
text: There's no disagreement,we must address China’s predatory industrial policies, but our producers can’t be expected to bear the brunt of this trade war. We must find proactive trade deals that recognize the benefits of free & open trade while penalizing bad actors that abuse it.

html: This week the House finally passed the Right to Try Act. This bill gives people with a terminally ill diagnoses the option to try medications that are in the clinical trial phase. I believe we should at least give our patients and their families a fighting chance. #GivethemHopepic.twitter.com/3FW6fYjhHh
text:
This week the House finally passed the Right to Try Act. This bill gives people with a terminally ill diagnoses the option to try medications that are in the clinical trial phase. I believe we should at least give our patients and their families a fighting chance. 
#GivethemHopepic.twitter.com/3FW6fYjhHh
